text: Nassarius luridus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The shell size varies between 12 mm and 20 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indo-West Pacific off Indonesia. ==References== * Cernohorsky W. O. (1984). Systematics of the family Nassariidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Bulletin of the Auckland Institute and Museum 14: 1–356 ==External links== * Gastropods.com : Nassarius (Telasco) luridus; accessed : 28 February 2011 Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1850
title: Nassarius luridus
